manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_meepo_qmbttz_set` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `share_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `share_desc` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `share_url` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `copyright` varchar(300) NOT NULL , `share_txt` varchar(500) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;
